casebody.data:
Murray BREIDBART, et al., Appellants,
v.
Melvin L. WIESENTHAL, et al., Defendants, Brooklawn Associates, et al., Respondents. Motion No: 2017-967 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided on December 14, 2017

Motion for leave to appeal denied with one hundred dollars costs and necessary reproduction disbursements.
